WFFL.Karma Chameleons: The Chameleons control the #1 seed (73.7%). They clinch it with a win over Ghost Legion OR a Taco Bills loss to Plundering Herd. Only way they drop to #2 is losing to Ghost Legion while Taco Bills wins.
WFFL.Taco Bills: Taco Bills have locked up a bye but are chasing the #1 seed (26.4%). They need to beat Plundering Herd AND have Ghost Legion upset Karma Chameleons. Otherwise, they're the #2 seed.
WFFL.Royal Flush: Playoffs clinched. Beat The Hack Attack and they're the #3 seed. Lose to The Hack Attack and they drop to #5.
WFFL.The Hack Attack: Playoffs clinched. Beat Royal Flush → #3 seed. Lose to Royal Flush → #4 seed if Junkyard Dogs loses to Ellis Islanders, #5 seed if Junkyard Dogs wins.
WFFL.Junkyard Dogs: Playoffs clinched. Beat Ellis Islanders → #4 seed locked. Lose to Ellis Islanders → #4 seed if The Hack Attack beats Royal Flush, #5 seed if The Hack Attack loses.
WFFL.MindHunter: Strong position at 67.6% playoff odds. Beat Olympus Mons at home and they clinch #6. Lose and they need at least two of {Goldenberg's, Ghost Legion, Ellis Islanders} to also lose.
WFFL.Goldenberg's Peanut Chews: Alive at 15.2%. Must beat THE Washington FT AND have MindHunter lose to Olympus Mons. If both happen, they're likely in via tiebreaker.
WFFL.Ghost Legion: Longshot at 11.9%. Need to upset Karma Chameleons AND have MindHunter lose. Even then, may need tiebreaker help.
WFFL.Ellis Islanders: Dark horse at 5.4%. Must beat Junkyard Dogs AND have MindHunter, Goldenberg's, and Ghost Legion ALL lose. If all four conditions hit, Ellis wins the 4-way tiebreaker for #6.

DFFL.Boston Stranglers: Locked into #1 seed and first-round bye regardless of their result against Rockville Reavers.
DFFL.Vanilla Thunder: Clinched playoffs. Beat St. Paul Soaks → #2 seed with bye. Lose to St. Paul Soaks → #4 seed, no bye.
DFFL.Hopewell Hitters: Playoffs secured. They get #2 seed with bye if Vanilla Thunder loses to St. Paul Soaks. Otherwise they're #4 seed, no bye.
DFFL.Air Nomad: Playoffs clinched. Beat Sac-Busters → #3 seed (37.9%). Lose to Sac-Busters → #5 seed (62.1%).
DFFL.Sac-Busters: Playoffs clinched. Beat Air Nomad → #3 seed (62.1%). Lose to Air Nomad → #5 seed (37.9%).
DFFL.St. Paul Soaks: Strong position at 90.6%. Beat Vanilla Thunder → clinch #6. Lose to Vanilla Thunder → need Al's Offenders to also lose to Novato Dawgs.
DFFL.Al's Offenders: Slim hopes at 9.4%. Must beat Novato Dawgs AND have St. Paul Soaks lose to Vanilla Thunder. If both happen, wins tiebreaker for #6.

FFPL.Boomie's Boys: Locked #1 seed and bye. Result against Mobius Strippers doesn't matter.
FFPL.Los Pollos Hermanos: Very likely #2 seed with bye (80.2%). Lose to ReBiggulators by 3+ points → drop to #4 with no bye.
FFPL.The ReBiggulators: Playoffs clinched. Beat Los Pollos Hermanos by 3+ → #2 seed with bye (19.8%). Otherwise battling for #4/#5.
FFPL.Mobius Strippers: Playoffs clinched. Battling ReBiggulators for #4/#5 seeding - most likely #5 (56.4%).
FFPL.The Original Series: Clinched playoffs. Beat Free The Nip → #3 seed with home field Round 1. Lose to Free The Nip → #6 seed on the road.
FFPL.Free The Nip: Playoffs secured. Beat The Original Series → #3 seed with home field Round 1. Lose to The Original Series → #6 seed on the road.
FFPL.Gashouse Gorillas: Safe. Out of playoffs but also safe from relegation regardless of result against Ytterby Yetis.
FFPL.Hampden Has-Beens: Danger zone at 54% relegation odds. Beat One Direction Two → safe from relegation. Lose to One Direction Two → relegation playoffs, seeding determined by Lester Pearls vs East Shore Boys result.
FFPL.Lester Pearls: In trouble at 59.1% relegation. Beat East Shore Boys → safe from relegation if Hampden beats One Direction Two, relegation playoffs R1/R2 seed if Hampden loses. Lose to East Shore Boys → relegation playoffs.
FFPL.Ytterby Yetis: Deep trouble at 86.9% relegation. Beat Gashouse Gorillas → still likely relegated unless both Hampden and Lester Pearls lose. Lose to Gashouse Gorillas → locked into relegation playoffs.
FFPL.One Direction Two: Locked into relegation playoffs (100%). Seeding within relegation bracket depends on other results.
FFPL.East Shore Boys: Locked into relegation playoffs (100%). Seeding within relegation bracket depends on Hampden vs One Direction Two result.
